article.title: Verrastro Assigned to Office, Assistant Secretary of the Navy

tags.tag: Office of the Assistant Secretary of the Navy

article.text: Capt. Paul J. Verrastro, USN, has been selected for promotion to rear admiral and will be assigned as executive director, deputy assistant secretary of the Navy (acquisition and procurement), Office of the Assistant Secretary of the Navy (research, development and acquisition), Washington, D.C.
